bibl.title: Telegram from [H.P.] McCain to John J. Moran, May 27, 1918

div1.p: McCain informs Moran of his appointment as captain in the Quartermaster Corps.

div1.head: Telegram from [H.P.] McCain to John J. Moran, May 27, 1918
div1.p:
Form 1204
WESTERN UNION
TELEGRAM
WESTERN UNION
AND CABLE
NEWCOMB CARLTON, PRESIDENT GEORGE W. E. ATKINS, FIRST VICE-PRESIDENT
__________________________________________________
NI 281 W. 73 St., N.Y.,
TELEPHONE 2098 COLUMBOS
RECEIVED AT
3NY TD 39 GOVT
DI WASHINGTON D.C. 550P MAY 27 JOHN J MORAN

ONE FORTY SEVEN WEST SEVENTY SECOND ST NEWYORK
YOU ARE APPOINTED CAPTAIN QUARTERMASTER CORPS NATIONAL ARMY WIRE
ACCEPTANCE GIVING FULL NAME AND RANK AND REPORT WITHOUT DELAY DEPOT
QUARTERMASTER NEWYORKCITY FOR DUTY.
